column1: 23562407$Noble Arms - Caliburn$Unlimited$SPELL$$$$$$$$$Equip$$$You can only control 1 "Noble Arms - Caliburn". Equip only to a Warrior-Type monster. It gains 500 ATK. Once per turn: You can gain 500 LP. If this face-up card on the field is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: You can target 1 Warrior-Type "Noble Knight" monster you control
column2: equip this card to that target. You can only use this effect of "Noble Arms - Caliburn" once per turn.$Supports archetypes /Noble Knight$$Activates from your Graveyard/Equips self from Graveyard$Condition/Continuous-like/Ignition-like/Trigger-like$
